mapper.select: SELECT ct.car_type_name, cc1.common_name AS fuel_type, cc2.common_name AS seating_capacity, rc.model_year, rc.car_image_name FROM rental_cars rc JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code JOIN common_codes cc1 ON cc1.common_code = ct.fuel_type AND cc1.common_kind_code = 'fuel_type' JOIN common_codes cc2 ON cc2.common_code = ct.seating_capacity AND cc2.common_kind_code = 'seating_capacity';
